title: Honor System
body: I've just hit level 5 in the current honor system. And I don't know I was promised a chance for 'Honor Capsules' and I've only seen 2 since honor3 whats the deal?

replies.body:
Lew is correct on that one :) Capsules are very rare and there isn't any sort of set number for how many you'll get each month. Your capsule drops can also be affected by your key fragment drops.

As linked earlier, we have a handy [Honor FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ) that can provide more information on how capsule drops work. If you have anymore questions, I can also answer those too :D

You get a random chance to get a [capsule ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ)anytime you would normally get a fragment drop and there isn't any guarantee that you will get capsules all the time.
